long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatSearch: ChatGPT for Search Engine - a free browser extension that aims to unleash the full potential of search engines like Bing, Google, Baidu, DuckDuckGo, and more. With AI tools powered by Microsoft Bingâ€™s GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude2, you can now easily access the powerful capabilities of artificial intelligence right from the search results page, taking your search experience to a whole new level. Install with just one click and start using it.

With ChatGPT for microsoft Bing, you can now take your Bing search experience to the next level by effortlessly accessing the power of ChatGPT's language generation technology right within your search results page.
Advantages of ChatGPT for Search Engine:

ğŸš€ Enhance your search results in any search engine by integrating ChatGPTâ€™s answers for users.
ğŸ¥³ It is available for free use  without any restrictions or the need to register an account.
ğŸ’¬ Start chatting with ChatGPT instantly by clicking the plugin button.
ğŸ¤–ï¸ Model support is expanded. In addition to GPT-3.5, you can also use GPT-4 and Claude2 to improve the accuracy of information.
ğŸ” Search functionality is enhanced, allowing you to utilize the powerful summarization capabilities of ChatGPT or Claude2 for web content.
ğŸŒ Internet connectivity is improved, eliminating gaps and providing you with the most accurate content based on real-time web information.

ğŸ›« Learn in one minute:
1ï¸âƒ£ Choose an API type, we recommend the Developer API (stable, free to use).
2ï¸âƒ£ Search your questions on various search engines and view the ChatGPT answers generated on the right side by Search+.
3ï¸âƒ£ Click the extension button to start chatting directly with ChatGPT.

â“ Frequently Asked Questions:
ğŸ“Œ Is ChatGPT for Search Engine free?
Yes, ChatGPT for Search Engine is free to use. Whether you are a domestic or international user, you can install it and use it immediately.
ğŸ“Œ What is the relationship between ChatGPT for Search Engine and ChatGPT?
ChatGPT for Search Engine is an AI tool developed based on the capabilities of the ChatGPT model, which has powerful ChatGPT abilities.
ğŸ“Œ What model does ChatGPT for Search Engine use?
ChatGPT for Search Engine supports GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude-2 models. We will also support more large language models as soon as possible.

ChatSearch is your most reliable search engine enhancement tool. With the powerful AI models GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and Claude-2, it provides you with the highest quality search content. You can rely on ChatSearch to analyze and summarize web content intelligently, greatly enhancing the real-time and accuracy of your search results.

Elevate your content game with ChatGPT - the ultimate browser extension for unleashing the power of ChatGPT on the new Bing!
